title: 190: How to Free Yourself from Opinions with Shelly Lefkoe
description:
How do you stop worrying about what people think?

If you are someone who has limited yourself in any area because you worry about other people's opinions, expectations, or criticisms, this is an episode you don't want to miss.

On today's show, we welcome back one of our dear and long time friends, Shelly Lefkoe. Shelly is the Co-founder of Lefkoe Institute and expert at transformation. Our conversation is an amazing follow-up from our previous talk titled "How Do You Undo Your Limiting Beliefs."

In this episode, Shelly explains that many of our beliefs are unconscious. Today, she reveals how they are formed and what's possible when we can free ourselves from others' opinions.

*** Do you want to stay up to date with every new episode and get my brand new Kwik Brain Accelerator Program? Go to www.KwikBrain.com/podcast to get instant access. ***
